LanguageData.Turret_single20mmGun.label: Oerlikon 20mm gun
LanguageData.Turret_single20mmGun.description: A Oerlikon 20mm machine gun.leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned. Cannot fire over wall.
LanguageData.Artillery_single20mmGun.label: 20mm gun
LanguageData.Turret_Dual20mmGun.label: Dual Oerlikon 20mm gun
LanguageData.Turret_Dual20mmGun.description: A double Oerlikon machine gun. Its shield protects the gunner. Must be manned. Cannot fire over wall.
LanguageData.Artillery_Dual20mmGun.label: 20mm gun
LanguageData.Turret_Quad20mmGun.label: Quad Oerlikon 20mm gun
LanguageData.Turret_Quad20mmGun.description: A quadruple 20mm machine gun mount. Its armor protects the gunner very well.leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Artillery_Quad20mmGun.label: 20mm gun
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Oerlikon.label: 20mm machine gun crate
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Oerlikon.description: 20mm Oerlikon machine gun. This is too heavy to hold and you need to make a turret for this.
